remarks: The upper bound of an open interval is a limit point of the interval. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
lptioo2.1 $e |- J = ( topGen ` ran (,) ) $.
lptioo2.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR* ) $.
lptioo2.3 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
lptioo2.4 $e |- ( ph -> A < B ) $.
lptioo2 $p |- ( ph -> B e. ( ( limPt ` J ) ` ( A (,) B ) ) ) $.
